cz.cuni.mff.d3s.deeco.knowledge

Class KnowledgeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.d3s.deeco.knowledge.KnowledgeManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RepositoryKnowledgeManager

    public abstract class KnowledgeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class providing higher level interface for accessing the knowledge repository.
    Author:
    Michal Kit

    • Constructor Detail

      • KnowledgeManager

        public KnowledgeManager()

    • Method Detail

      • getKnowledge

        public abstract java.lang.Object getKnowledge(java.lang.String knowledgePath,
                            java.lang.Class structure,
                            ISession session)
                                       throws KMException
        Retrieves knowledge from the knowledge repository, defined by both knowledgePath and structure. This method is session oriented.
        Parameters:
        knowledgePath - nesting at which the knowledge structure should be rooted
        structure - Knowledge structure (Knowledge Interface)
        session - a session object within which all the retrieval should be performed
        Returns:
        retrieved knowledge object of type structure
        Throws:
        KMException - thrown whenever there is a problem accessing the knowledge repository

      • putKnowledge

        public abstract void putKnowledge(java.lang.String knowledgePath,
                java.lang.Object value,
                ISession session)
                           throws KMException
        Puts knowledge object to the knowledge repository. This method is session oriented.
        Parameters:
        knowledgePath - nesting at which the knowledge object should be stored
        value - knowledge to be stored
        session - a session object within which all the put operations should be performed
        Throws:
        KMException - thrown whenever there is a problem accessing the knowledge repository

      • takeKnowledge

        public abstract java.lang.Object takeKnowledge(java.lang.String knowledgePath,
                             java.lang.Class structure,
                             ISession session)
                                        throws KMException
        Withdraws the knowledge from the knowledge repository. This method is session oriented.
        Parameters:
        knowledgePath - nesting at which the knowledge structure should be rooted
        structure - Knowledge structure (Knowledge Interface)
        session - a session object within which all the withdrawals should be performed
        Returns:
        retrieved knowledge object of type structure
        Throws:
        KMException - thrown whenever there is a problem accessing the knowledge repository

      • findAllProperties

        public abstract java.lang.String[] findAllProperties(java.lang.String knowledgePath,
                                   ISession session)
        Function tries to find all the flat (not hierarchical structures) properties in the knowledge repository. This method is session oriented.
        Parameters:
        knowledgePath - absolute name (knowledge path) of the property
        session - a session object within which finding should be performed
        Returns:
        an array of matched objects

      • createSession

        public abstract ISession createSession()
        Creates ISession object instance.
        Returns:
        ISession object instance.

        Retrieves knowledge from the knowledge repository, defined by both knowledgePath and structure.
        Parameters:

        structure - Knowledge structure (Knowledge Interface)
        Returns:

      • getKnowledge

        public java.lang.Object getKnowledge(java.lang.String knowledgePath)
                              throws KMException
        Retrieves knowledge from the knowledge repository, defined by knowledgePath.
        Parameters:
        absolute - name (knowledge path) of the property to be retrieved
        Returns:
        retrieved knowledge object
        Throws:
        KMException - thrown whenever there is a problem accessing the knowledge repository
